name: pompom (pataya, mim)
description:
pompom our entry for ludum dare 47 (stuck in a loop)

`ღ´- \(ᵔᵕᵔ)/ -`ღ´-

your dad brought you to the park and you've been going round and round on the carousel for hours, it's almost time to go home!

grab the pompom for a chance to have one last free ride!
but maybe daddy is willing to pay you one more ride...

press left click to grab
hold space to jump

webgl is a bit laggy for now, we'll try doing a small optimization pass in the following days if we have time, feel free to download the windows version in the meantime

-`ღ´- \(ᵔᵕᵔ)/ -`ღ´-

code, tech art, ui - nicolas ceriani
art - laura nadal
